```{r setup}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(httr)
})

options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
stars <- httr::GET("https://adventofcode.com/2020/leaderboard/private/view/1032765.json",
                   httr::set_cookies(session = Sys.getenv("session_cookie"))) %>% 
  content() %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  hoist("members",
        "user_name"="name",
        "user_id"="id",
        "aoc_score"="local_score",
        "completed_stars"="completion_day_level",
        "total_stars" = "stars"
        ) %>% 
  unnest_longer('completed_stars',indices_to = "day") %>% 
  unnest_longer("completed_stars",indices_to = "star") %>% 
  unnest_longer("completed_stars",indices_include = FALSE) %>% 
  select("user_name","user_id","aoc_score","total_stars","day","star","timestamp"="completed_stars") %>%
  filter(!is.na(star)) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = star, values_from = timestamp, names_glue = "star{star}_timestamp") %>% 
  mutate_at(c("star1_timestamp","star2_timestamp"),~ as.numeric(.x) %>% lubridate::as_datetime()) %>% 
  mutate(time_to_star2 = (star2_timestamp-star1_timestamp) %>% round(1))

stars

leaderboard <- stars %>% 
  group_by(user_name,user_id,aoc_score,total_stars) %>% 
  summarise(median_time_to_star2 = median(time_to_star2,na.rm = TRUE) %>% round(1)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  arrange(desc(total_stars),median_time_to_star2)

leaderboard
```
